title: Peggy's opportunity cost of community college

content.question: After graduating from high school, Peggy Smith decided to enroll in a two-year program at the local community college rather than to accept a job that offered a salary of $12,000 per year. If the annual tuition and fees are $4,600, the annual opportunity cost of attending the community college is

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
